channel.title: {718} Drop Editor Help
channel.description:
Can anyone help me using teamviewer with my drop editor? i tried and i keep on getting this error:
Error: Could not find or load main class com.rs.tools.DropEditor.java Press any key to continue . . .
The DropEditor is in the right spot.

item.title: {718} Drop Editor Help
item.dc:creator: @Its_Not_Okay Its Not Okay
item.description:
@Its_Not_Okay wrote:

I did that and now i get this:

Read full topic

item.title: {718} Drop Editor Help
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

[quote=“Its Not Okay, post:3, topic:537041”]This is my drop editor runner:

@echo off
title rundropeditor
"C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx815m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.tools.DropEditor.java true true false
pause[/quote]

The reason this isn’t working is because you put DropEditor.java. Your trying to access a java file which you shouldn’t be, you should be trying to access a class file hence why you get the error can’t find or load class file.

Just use this:

@echo off title rundropeditor "C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx815m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.tools.DropEditor true true false pause

Read full topic

item.title: {718} Drop Editor Help
item.dc:creator: @Its_Not_Okay Its Not Okay
item.description:

This is my drop editor runner:

@echo off
title rundropeditor
"C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx815m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.tools.DropEditor.java true true false
pause

Read full topic

item.title: {718} Drop Editor Help
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Well in the error it is telling you it can’t find where the class file is located.

Make sure you put the correct path directory.

Read full topic
